game.name: Dolmenjord - Viking Islands
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Arrange Viking villages in the islands to expand their domains, in this logic puzzle game! After years of battles, a group of Vikings decided to conquer new lands. Under the protection of the god Njord, a new clan sets out in search of glory!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Arrange Viking villages in the islands to expand their domains, in this logic puzzle game! After years of battles, a group of Vikings decided to conquer new lands. Under the protection of the god Njord, a new clan sets out in search of glory!

reviewHighlights.text: Nice fun puzzle game that you can casually sink a few hours into
Relaxing Puzzle game. Some levels can be tricky but in general should be doable on the first try most of them. In case of trouble there are guides ava...
